title: Wild bush budgie; a very particular parrot.
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Sky Visuals, National Geographic Society, Gary Steer and Richard Campbell
brief_description: Wild Bush Budgie: The Budgerigar is one of the most popular caged birds. In its native Outback environment, the humble “Budgie” is a master of survival. Introduces this common but very appealing bird. “A very particular parrot” profiles the rare Golden Shouldered Parrot. Only 150 pairs survive in the wild and private collectors are attempting to breed the species in order to safegaurd their survival.
